mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select * from (select match_user_id,count(1) as count from busi_customer WHERE follow_next_date > now() and project_id =#{projectId} and status = 1 group by match_user_id )as a left join sys_user on(sys_user.user_id=match_user_id)

select * from (select match_user_id,count(1) as count from busi_customer WHERE follow_next_date <= now() and project_id =#{projectId} and status = 1 group by match_user_id )as a left join sys_user on(sys_user.user_id=match_user_id)

select t2.user_id,t2.username,t2.email,t2.mobile,t2.create_time from busi_user_project t1 left join sys_user t2 on(t1.user_id = t2.user_id) where t1.project_id =#{projectId} and app_role = 2 and status=1
